languages.text: "Твой хозяин просто нашел полезного мясника, чтобы спихнуть на него грязную работу и не марать руки. Как и всегда вы делаете".
"Your master merely found a useful butcher to saddle with the dirty work so he could keep his hands clean. It is always the way with your ilk."
languages.original_text: "Твой хозяин просто нашел полезного мясника, чтобы спихнуть на него грязную работу и не марать руки. Как и всегда вы делаете".

traits.locale_text: "Your master merely found a useful butcher to saddle with the dirty work so he could keep his hands clean. It is always the way with your ilk."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your master merely found a useful butcher to saddle with the dirty work so he could keep his hands clean. It is always the way with your ilk."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your master merely found a useful butcher to saddle with the dirty work so he could keep his hands clean. It is always the way with your ilk."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your master merely found a useful butcher to saddle with the dirty work so he could keep his hands clean. It is always the way with your ilk."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “你的主人只不过找了个能干的屠夫干脏活，这样他就没必要弄脏自己的手了。你们这种人一直都是这么办事的。”
languages.original_text: "Your master merely found a useful butcher to saddle with the dirty work so he could keep his hands clean. It is always the way with your ilk."

traits.locale_text: “你的主人只不过找了个能干的屠夫干脏活，这样他就没必要弄脏自己的手了。你们这种人一直都是这么办事的。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Votre maître n'a fait que confier le sale travail à un boucher pour éviter d'avoir à se salir les mains lui-même. C'est toujours pareil, avec vous autres. »
languages.original_text: "Your master merely found a useful butcher to saddle with the dirty work so he could keep his hands clean. It is always the way with your ilk."

traits.locale_text: « Votre maître n'a fait que confier le sale travail à un boucher pour éviter d'avoir à se salir les mains lui-même. C'est toujours pareil, avec vous autres. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Su amo ha encontrado a una carnicera útil a la que encargar el trabajo sucio sin mancharse las manos. Los de su calaña siempre hacen lo mismo».
languages.original_text: "Your master merely found a useful butcher to saddle with the dirty work so he could keep his hands clean. It is always the way with your ilk."

traits.locale_text: «Su amo ha encontrado a una carnicera útil a la que encargar el trabajo sucio sin mancharse las manos. Los de su calaña siempre hacen lo mismo».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「お前の主人は、自分の手を汚さずに汚ない仕事を押しつけられる便利な肉屋を見つけたな。お前の同類のいつものやり方だ」
languages.original_text: "Your master merely found a useful butcher to saddle with the dirty work so he could keep his hands clean. It is always the way with your ilk."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の主人は、自分の手を汚さずに汚ない仕事を押しつけられる便利な肉屋を見つけたな。お前の同類のいつものやり方だ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Euer Meister hat lediglich eine nützliche Schlächterin gefunden, der er die Drecksarbeit übertragen kann, um sich nicht selbst die Hände schmutzig zu machen. So ist das bei Euresgleichen immer."
languages.original_text: "Your master merely found a useful butcher to saddle with the dirty work so he could keep his hands clean. It is always the way with your ilk."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Meister hat lediglich eine nützliche Schlächterin gefunden, der er die Drecksarbeit übertragen kann, um sich nicht selbst die Hände schmutzig zu machen. So ist das bei Euresgleichen immer."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Your master merely found a useful butcher to saddle with the dirty work so he could keep his hands clean. It is always the way with your ilk."

languages.text: "Efendin, pis işlerin sorumluluğunu devredip ellerini de kirletmemek için işe yarar bir kasap buldu işte. Hepiniz aynı haltsınız."
languages.original_text: "Your master merely found a useful butcher to saddle with the dirty work so he could keep his hands clean. It is always the way with your ilk."

traits.locale_text: "Efendin sadece pis işlerin sorumluluğunu devretmek ve ellerini kirletmemek için işe yarar bir kasap buldu. Senin türün hep aynı."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
